game.name: Grow a Girlfriend
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Narrated Game Menus, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You accidentally grew a mushroom girl! Overcome your social anxiety to help her live her brief life to the fullest! Or don't.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You accidentally grew a mushroom girl! Overcome your social anxiety to help her live her brief life to the fullest! Or don't.
